name: PageMaker 5.0 Document
summary: Learn about .PM5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: PM5 files can be opened by Adobe PageMaker 5.0 and later. They can be converted to .PMD files with PageMaker 7.0, which can be opened with Adobe InDesign.

description: Page layout document created by Adobe PageMaker 5, a program for creating high-quality publications; may be a newsletter, brochure, flyer, or other type of document; includes text, graphics, and page formatting data.
